gr.fire.util
Class Lang

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.util.Lang

public final class Lang
extends java.lang.Object

The Lang class in an easy to use internationallization (i18n) implementation. The default language is English. Every key is the english version of the required text. If the key string maps to to a translation then the translation is returned. Othewise the key itself is returned. The class can load files with "key=value" pairs of strings on each line. The bundles can be loaded (using the FireIO class) either from a file inside the jar, or from a remote location or from a record in the midlets record store. The only requirement for a language file to be valid is to contain a key=value pair of the form language_key=IT For example if a language bundle is the translations to Greek, it should contain one key=value pair of the form language_key=GR The value part of the pair is not required to be anything specific, it is just an identifier for the given language bundle.

Author:
padeler
